attributes.action: Stop Unfair dismissal cases at work being investigated by workers employed in the same local  council area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop top bosses taking the sides of seniors after you have been dismissed from work unfairly .. .i.e whistle blowers getting sacked and removed for doing their job correctly and reporting those that aren't . Managers being friends with managers and taking a biased view resulting in loss of employment .. WE NEED AN INDEPENDENT TEAM OF INVESTIGATORS!
